name: hyfo Easy Start
body:
## Welcome 

hyfo is an **R package** which can be used as a tool for hydrological and forecasting. There are several tools in R including data processing, data visualization and data analysis. For hydrological and hydraulic modellers, hyfo can be a good preprocessing and postprocessing tool for you.

hyfo has been tested stable on windows platform.

## User manual

pdf version [here](http://media.wix.com/ugd/199c69_29883401bc5e458598579e33f1badb3c.pdf), easier to download.

html version [here](http://rpubs.com/rankthefirst/hyfo), easier to copy paste codes.

## Installation

You can directly download from the link above, and install in an R IDE e.g. Rstudio. **Or** use the

**Simpler** way to install the latest version.
```{r, results='hide'}
  install.packages('devtools')
  # Ignore the warning that Rtool is not installed, unless you want other function from devtools.
  # If "devtools" is already installed in your computer, you can directly run the following code.
  devtools::install_github('Yuanchao-Xu/hyfo')
```

## Historical Releases

For historical releases and the introduction of updates about each version, please click [here](https://github.com/Yuanchao-Xu/hyfo/releases)
